item.title: Important Registry Keys
item.description: In this list I collect all the registry keys that I learned about or had experience with in the past and that are useful for forensics purposes (or may be not).

item.title: Local Authentication
item.description: This article is all about such scary terms as LSA, local authentication, SAM etc. Also, I’ve tries to highlight the updates on the implementation for different Windows versions.
